trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: 终止正在运行的工作流实例时，引发<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>主机，并报告错误信息中的事件。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 工作流终止后，将无法恢复。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置导致实例终止的异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: 传递给异常<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>是<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>如果只有<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>设置。</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果只设置异常，则将该异常传递给<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>和异常设置、<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>传递具有指定<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>，并且异常设置为异常的<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果两者均未设置，默认<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>创建。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串输入参数与工作流实例终止的原因。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: 传递给异常<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>是<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>如果仅设置原因。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>设置，该异常将传递到<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时原因和<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>设置，<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>与指定的原因，一起传递和<xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>被设置为异常的<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果两者均未设置，默认<xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>创建。</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>
